4d1d128e-8b58-4ab5-9b77-114ef9b8000e.description: The deployment environment for the service.
4d1d128e-8b58-4ab5-9b77-114ef9b8000e.name: deployment_environment
4d1d128e-8b58-4ab5-9b77-114ef9b8000e.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT(JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment_environment'))
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v4
WHERE metric_name like '%hadoop_hdfs_%'

ab996dc3-7360-48fb-8778-1f530b944025.name: cluster
ab996dc3-7360-48fb-8778-1f530b944025.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT(JSONExtractString(labels, 'cluster'))
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v4
WHERE metric_name like '%hadoop_hdfs_%'
